author: tensorflower-gardener
message:
Integrate LLVM at llvm/llvm-project@4d45718b4789

Updates LLVM usage to match
[4d45718b4789](https://github.com/llvm/llvm-project/commit/4d45718b4789)

PiperOrigin-RevId: 816906690

files.patch:
@@ -4,8 +4,8 @@ load("//third_party:repo.bzl", "tf_http_archive")
 
 def repo(name):
     """Imports LLVM."""
-    LLVM_COMMIT = "4efe170d858eb54432f520abb4e7f0086236748b"

     tf_http_archive(
         name = name,
